content.query:
BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where data_type == "finding_export"
| where exposure != 0
| where path_type != ""
| extend Severity = case(
    exposure < 40.0, 'low',
    exposure >= 40.0 and exposure <= 79.0, 'medium',
    exposure > 79.0 and exposure <= 94.0, 'high',
    exposure > 94.0, 'critical',
    'unknown' 
    )
| project 
    Domain = domain_name,
    ['Attack Path'] = path_type,
    Severity,
    ['Exposure %'] = exposure
